xdm:roleID.title: Contact Role ID
xdm:roleID.description: Contact role unique identifier.This field could be used to collect data that may be considered to be sensitive or personal. Go here: https://www.adobe.com/go/xdm-spi-and-pii for more information.

xdm:opportunityContactRole.title: Opportunity Contact Role
xdm:opportunityContactRole.description: Role of the opportunity contact like finance , sales .

xdm:isPrimary.title: Primary Flag
xdm:isPrimary.description: A flag to signify that this is the primary opportunity contact

xdm:isDeleted.title: Deleted Flag
xdm:isDeleted.description: A flag to signify that this opportunity is in deleted state.
